Notice:

Water Bills are due by the 10th of each month.  If you did not receive your bill, call City Hall at 979-793-4253 to get your bill amount.     |     View the [2025 Hurricane Preparedness Guide](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/2025-hurricane-preparedness-guide)

for the Houston-Galveston Region.

News & Information
==================

2025 Hurricane Preparedness Guide

With the 2025 hurricane season here, please review the 2025 Hurricane Preparedness Guide for the Houston-Galveston region.

 [LEARN MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/2025-hurricane-preparedness-guide)

2025 Updated Building Codes & Ordinances

View the Ordinance that updates the City of Needville building codes.

 [VIEW ORDINANCE](https://irp.cdn-website.com/b127c118/files/uploaded/ORD24-15_Updating_City_of_Needville_Building_Codes_241211.pdf)

Church Street Intersection Realignment

On Wednesday, September 18, 2024, Fort Bend County Engineering held a preconstruction meeting for...

 [LEARN MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/church-street-intersection-realignment)

City of Needville - 2025 Adopted Budget

The City of Needville has adopted a budget for fiscal year 2025.

 [LEARN MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/2025-adopted-budget)

City of Needville - 2025 Proposed Budget

The City of Needville has proposed a budget for fiscal year 2025.

 [LEARN MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/2025-proposed-budget)

SiEnvironmental to Conduct EPA Lead & Copper Line Survey

The City of Needville has hired SiEnvironmental to conduct an EPA lead and copper line survey.

 [LEARN MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/epa-lead-copper-line-survey)

2023 Consumer Confidence Report for Public Water System

This is your water quality report for January I to December 31, 2023

 [LEARN MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/2023-consumer-confidence-report-public-water-system)

CenterPoint Energy - Tree Trimming Info

If you have questions or believe your tree is within 10 feet of power lines, contact CenterPoint Energy.

 [LEARN MORE](https://www.centerpointenergy.com/en-us/Safety/Pages/Tree-Trimming-Removal.aspx?sa=ho&au=res)

Unclaimed Property - 2024

The City of Needville is currently holding various types of property (valued at $100 or less) that are unclaimed.

 [READ MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/unclaimed-property-2024)

Fort Bend County - Extreme Weather Event Survey

If you had damage to your property due to the most recent Extreme Weather Event March 15-16, 2024, complete this survey.

 [READ MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/fort-bend-county-extreme-weather-event-survey)

Planning Commission Submittal Schedule, 2024

The Planning Commission has approved their Submittal Schedule for fiscal year 2024.

 [READ MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/2024-planning-commission-submittal-schedule)

City is Smoke Testing the Sewer System, 2024

On October 2023, the city of Needville advertised a bid for smoke testing the sanitary sewer system to detect infiltration of water.

 [READ MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/2024-smoke-testing-sewer-system)

Notice of Meeting - West Fort Bend Water Authority

The Board of Directors of West Fort Bend Water Authority will hold a meeting on Thursday, February 1, 2024 at 12PM.

 [READ MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/west-fort-bend-water-authority-meeting-feb-2024)

Adopted Budget for Fiscal Year 2024

The City of Needville has adopted an official budget detailing our plans moving forward for fiscal year 2024.

 [READ MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/2024-adopted-budget)

Golf Cart Ordinance Passed

Effective April 12, 2023, there is a 90 day grace period.

 [READ MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/golf-cart-ordinance)

New Filing Fee Rates for Plats & Plans

Learn about Subdivision/Planning Submittal Instructions.

 [READ MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/new-filing-fee-rates)

Rentals Inside City Limits

Find out who to contact in order to rent a facility for private events.

 [READ MORE](https://www.cityofneedville.com/news/rentals-inside-city-limits)
